Title: Relates to the standard of proof for unfounded and indicated reports of child abuse or maltreatment
Summary: Relates to the standard of proof for unfounded and indicated reports of child abuse or maltreatment; requires a fair preponderance of evidence of the alleged abuse or maltreatment for a report to be indicated.
LawCode: Amd ยง412, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the standard of proof for unfounded and indicated reports of abuse or maltreatment
